snippet: Flames were shooting from a top-floor window of a six-story brick building on East 191st Street in the Bronx when firefighters arrived early Saturday.
abstract: Firefighters rescue three people from a burning apartment in the Bronx; two children and their father are in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: Flames were shooting from a top-floor window of a six-story brick building on East 191st Street in the Bronx when firefighters arrived early Saturday.

headline.main: Firefighters Rescue Three in Bronx Apartment Blaze
headline.print_headline: Firefighters Rescue Three In Bronx Apartment Blaze
